Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='BP89')

BibliographicData.Title: Architecture and connections of prefrontal cortex

Reference.Quotation: "In case 1 an isotope injection was placed in the caudal orbital cortex and involved primarily the area we termed proisocortex and to a lesser extent the adjacent area 13…"

"Labeled grains in this case were observed in the adjacent portions of proisocortex and area 13. Additionally, label was found in area 14 medially, 12 laterally, and in areas 11 and 10 rostrally on the orbital surface. On the medial surface areas 25, 32, 14, and to a lesser extent area 9 also contained label. Moreover, in this case label was noted on the lateral surface in areas 12 and 10."

Reference.Comments: Table 2, p. 371, mentions an area "D9", but according to p. 360 and the usage in the rest of the text area 9 is subdivided into M9 and L9. Therefore, "D9" is understood as being part of L9.
